reviewText: Got this as my dad's birthday gift since he's a surfer. Took a little longer than expected to arrive, but came with a neat little framed picture of a surfer that my dad really liked. He said he didn't like the video so much because there wasn't much narration. It wasn't as good as some of the other videos he's seen. I think he liked the framed picture better than the video.

Just watching Wayne Lynch at the beginning of this film makes it obvious that he was way ahead of his time. This whole thing was super new when the film came out in '71 and these three made the boards do what they do. Super insperational for sure.
